column5: They come to my work for ATV service and are openly (posted too) hiring. Seeing as I am a former Queen's York Ranger I am lucky enough to no longer have to pay to play.¬† One bonus one get's as a Vet...¬† Well, the only one...
Good for you!¬† And thank you for your service. Doug
Yeah they waited till I was over 65 to let former armed forces personnel to fish without a license. ¬†Why couldn‚Äôt they do it years before lol
and thank YOU for YOUR service!
Got my new card in the mail maybe 2 weeks after ordering online.¬† Painless.

Painless, yes for sure, once a person could do it. My beef is they could TELL US on the website that one cannot renew until such and such a date.¬† OR, why not allow a person to renew two months in advance, or three, or ???¬† It strikes me as bureaucracy of the worst order to deny permission to renew until only a month is left in the card.
Yeah, I ran into that as well! Thought that I would get ahead of the game and register in Nov. but found out that I couldn't! LOL
That was bad enough, but THEY WOULD NOT TELL YOU what date you could actually apply!!!!¬† Bone-headed bureaucrats.....
Exactly, I was trying to figure out what I was doing wrong! LOL
Well, I noticed it said not to apply before the 1st Tuesday in Dec.
Yup, I read it on their site and got mine on the first day I could get it
The on line system is up and working, don't forget to print it off and carry with you, only 3 1/2 weeks until old cards expire.
Thank you - i just renewed mine.
Thanks for the heads up. Just finished renewing mine.

as of TODAY!¬† Before today you could not renew the OC or buy your small game licences.¬† Which is freakin' RIDICULOUS.¬† Like HELLO!!!!!¬† WHY can't their system let me renew my card a month before it expires? grumble, grumble, grumble...............
The shorter the renewal period, the more likely they will catch someone that forgot.
Do you need an outdoors card to fish if you are over 65 and don't need a license.
NO. https://oodmag.com/ask-a-co-outdoors-cards-for-seniors-over-65/
No you don‚Äôt just a government photo id
Good call, just renewed online.¬† We'll see how long it takes the new card to show up.
Did you know that your cards and such are processed in the US‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
Yes, have been for quite a number of years, another brain dead government move.
I haven‚Äôt got an issue with it well ya maybe I do it really should be taken care of in house i would like to think their are people smart enough to program that in house
Subbing out to cheapest contractor I guess. Service Ontario wanted too much. You know, having to pay decent wages and benefits they can't compete with Americans
There are a number of companies capable of issuing cards here in the GTA. Priced themselves out of contention? HH

It is the entire licencing system that Ontario offshored.¬† Purchasing printing and mailing the OC but also purchasing and issuing the tags, etc etc. But the skeptic in me thinks the Ontario government of the day probably had a POLITICAL reason for this decision..........
thanks for the reminder! I miss the old days when they would send you a renewal package as a reminder
Ordered my card Dec 6th and it showed up in my mailbox today. Bring on the ice¬†üëç
Well, time to check the mailbox, that's pretty fast.
Yup, mine came yesterday
Funny enough - i got it yesterday as well.
Did mine on Dec 6 and it came Dec. 15
Looks like the proverbial hot dog mill is working fast this year, got mine too.
nothing here in Kingston yet...........and I submitted it as soon as I could............
Great reminder! Already renewed mine!
Perhaps, but there are almost no front line MNR officers in the field, sadly.
